headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for climate based adaptive irrigation sprinkler control. Default [values][range] mentioned in description.

disableAdaptiveWatering.title: Disable Adaptive Control
disableAdaptiveWatering.description: Disable if you dont want climate based adaptive calculations. [false]

latitude.title: Latitude:
latitude.description: Enter the latitude in decimals including '-' if in the southern hemisphere. [-90 - 90]

lowThreshold.title: Lower Threshold Temperature:
lowThreshold.description: Skip scheduling when forecasted minimum temperature falls below this. [10°C][4°C - 20°C]

highThreshold.title: High Threshold Temperature:
highThreshold.description: Skip scheduling when forecasted maximum temperature stays below this. [20°C][10°C - 30°C]

rainThreshold.title: Rain Threshold:
rainThreshold.description: Skip scheduling if rain forecasted above this level. [2.5mm][0mm - 100mm]

defaultDuration.title: Default Watering Duration per zone:
defaultDuration.description: Default total watering time per zone (minutes). [20][0 - 500]

maxDuration.title: Maximum Watering Duration per zone:
maxDuration.description: Maximum limit for adaptive schedule per zone (minutes). [30][0 - 500]

cycles.title: Cycles per zone:
cycles.description: Number of cycles per zone (watering is spread between cycles). [2][1 - 5]

sunriseOffset.title: Sunrise Offest:
sunriseOffset.description: Minutes before the sunrise watering should get over by.
